it.unipi.ing.mim.facerecognition

Class CompareTwoImages

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.unipi.ing.mim.facerecognition.CompareTwoImages

  • public class CompareTwoImages
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides the methods used to compare two images, both with a preliminary face detection or without. It also contains a main to test the second option.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CompareTwoImages()

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods

      static boolean compare(java.lang.String imgPath1, java.lang.String imgPath2)
      Compares the two specified images and evaluates whether they are the same person or not.
      static int compareWithFaceDetection(java.lang.String imgPath1, java.lang.String imgPath2)
      Compares the two specified images performing a preliminary face detection.

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • compare

        public static boolean compare(java.lang.String imgPath1,
                              java.lang.String imgPath2)
                       throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Compares the two specified images and evaluates whether they are the same person or not.
        Parameters:
        imgPath1 - is the path of the first image
        imgPath2 - is the path of the second image
        Returns:
        true if the two images contain the same person, false otherwise
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException

      • compareWithFaceDetection

        public static int compareWithFaceDetection(java.lang.String imgPath1,
                                           java.lang.String imgPath2)
                                    throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Compares the two specified images performing a preliminary face detection. For each face detected in the first image evaluates whether it appears also in the second image or not. Outputs the results as pairs of matching faces in an Html file specified in RecognitionParameters.
        Parameters:
        imgPath1 - is the path of the first image
        imgPath2 - is the path of the second image
        Returns:
        the number of matching faces
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
